alert.note: Alert for Auglaize; Hardin; Logan; Shelby (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 02 at 12:39AM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SHELBY, NORTHWESTERN CHAMPAIGN, LOGAN, AUGLAIZE AND SOUTHWESTERN HARDIN COUNTIES THROUGH 115 AM EDT... At 1239 AM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located near St. Paris, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph, frequent cloud-to-ground lightning, and very heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Lightning can cause serious injury or death. Visibility will be poor and hydroplaning is possible. Locations impacted include... Sidney, Bellefontaine, Urbana, Wapakoneta, St. Marys, Fort Shawnee, New Bremen, Minster, St. Paris, Newport, Cridersville, West Liberty, Anna, Fort Loramie, Jackson Center, Russells Point, De Graff, Botkins, Lakeview and New Knoxville. This includes I-75 in Ohio between mile markers 86 and 118. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. Motorists should slow down and use extra caution. When thunder roars, go indoors! Do not stay in the open or seek shelter under trees when lightning threatens. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
